title: Vietnamese-esque Sans-serif
content:
Hi guys,  
does anyone know of a typeface that is similar to the one attached here?  
I'm working on a novel that centers around a vietnam refugee, and I'd love to set the title in something like this.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [img\_1259.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714012629/http:/typophile.com/files/img_1259.jpg) | 48.19 KB |
author: bphil00

comments.content:
Perhaps you can find something you like by following links from Luc Devroye's [Vietnamese](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714012629/http:/luc.devroye.org/vietnam.html) page. I never cease to be amazed at Luc's productivity in creating and maintaining a large number of pages on the font scene around the world.  
Hopefully one of our typophiles will suggest a font with Vietnamese diacritics that resembles the lettering in the picture.  
Don
